net.sf.javaml.tools
Class InstanceTools

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.javaml.tools.InstanceTools

public class InstanceTools
extends java.lang.Object

Provides utility methods for manipulating, creating and modifying instances.

Version:
0.1.5
Author:
Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)
See Also:
Instance, SimpleInstance

public static double[] array(Instance inst)
Create an array representation of the instance attributes.

Parameters:

randomInstance

public static Instance randomInstance(int length)
Creates a random instance with the given number of attributes. The values of all attributes are between 0 and 1.

Parameters:
length - the number of attributes in the instance.
Returns:
a random instance

randomGaussianInstance

public static Instance randomGaussianInstance(int length)
Creates a random instance with the given number of attributes. The values of the attributes follow a normal distribution with mean 0 and std 1.

Parameters:
length - the number of attributes in the instance.
Returns:
a random instance

hasMissingValues

public static boolean hasMissingValues(Instance inst)
Checks if there are any missing values in the instance. Missing values are denoted by Double.NaN.

Parameters:
inst - the instance to check for missing values
Returns:
true is the instance contains missing values, false in other cases.
